subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga was trying to become the first Frenchman to make the final at Roland Garros since 1988, but David Ferrer instead gave Spain the final it had wished for.
snippet: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga was trying to become the first Frenchman to make the final at Roland Garros since 1988, but David Ferrer instead gave Spain the final it had wished for.
